item.description:
Meet at the cafe at Borders and listen to some local talent while sipping on a coffee, tea, latte or whatever you prefer.

The acts begin at 6 pm, but I'll be there at 5 pm so come early if you can to socialize and get a java and/or a bite to eat.

Are you talented? Then maybe you'd like to participate in the talent line up.  Get there early to sign up.

The show ends at 9 pm and the store closes at 10 pm.  Come any time you like - we'll save you a seat!
item.why: You can either be an act or just come and watch!
item.name: Open Mic Night at Borders Cafe in Shrewsbury
